vclaim: During the filming of the 1993 comedy “Mrs. Doubtfire,” actor Robin Williams improvised with so many off-color NSFW jokes that the director, Chris Columbus, ended up with multiple cuts of the film, including a NC-17 and R-rated version.
title: Is There an NC-17 and R-Rated Version of ‘Mrs. Doubtfire’?
subtitle: The 1993 Robin Williams film is rumored to have additional scenes with some NSFW humor.
author: Nur Ibrahim
